mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BACKPORT_CONDI(port_no, user_id, back_title, back_descript, back_start_asset, back_start_date , back_end_date, back_fee_rate, back_slippage, back_tax_rate, back_stock_cnt, back_rebal_cycle,back_invest_rate ,back_Market, back_Care, back_Manage, back_Preferred, back_Etf,back_CashFlow, back_Profit ,back_Trans_Amt,back_Amt,back_Market_Cap,back_Cap, back_Buy_Price, back_Sell_Price,back_Min_PriceS,back_Min_PriceV,back_Min_Price, back_Cap_UpDown,back_Cap_Rate,back_Condi_Val ) VALUES(seq_backtest_condi_port.NEXTVAL, #{userId},#{backTitle},#{backDescript},#{backStartAsset},#{backStartDate},#{backEndDate},#{backFeeRate}, #{backSlippage}, #{backTaxRate}, #{backStockCnt},#{backRebalCycle},#{backInvestRate},#{backMarket},#{backCare},#{backManage},#{backPreferred},#{backEtf}, #{backCashFlow},#{backProfit},#{backTransAmt},#{backAmt},#{backMarketCap},#{backCap},#{backBuyPrice},#{backSellPrice}, #{backMinPriceS}, #{backMinPriceV},#{backMinPrice},#{backCapUpDown},#{backCapRate},#{backCondiVal})
